title: Commercial vehicle sales volumes may degrow by 3-6% in FY25: CARE Ratings
description: Commercial Vehicle (CV) sales volumes are projected to decline by 3-6% in FY25, driven by weak demand in MHCV and LCV segments and high dealer inventory levels. However, a rebound is expected in the second half of the fiscal year due to post-election infrastructure projects and replacement demand. Despite challenges, recovery is anticipated with GDP growth and potential interest rate cuts supporting the industry.
